ascender noun [C]
(LETTER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
language
  specialized part of a written or typed letter that reaches higher than the top of a letter "x", for example the upper part of the letters "b", "d", or "h": The point size of a font is measured from the top of the ascender to the bottom of the descender. His writing was large and flowing, with prominent ascenders and descenders. Compare
descender
More examplesFewer examplesThe child must be able to produce letters that are recognizably formed and have clear ascenders and descenders.The lower case letters were 4 mm in height without ascenders.Remember to leave space above and below the line for ascenders and descenders.

ascender noun [C]
(CLIMBING)
sports
  specialized a device that can be attached to a rope and used as a support to hold or stand on when climbing: The final 20 metres to the top was extremely steep, requiring use of the ascender and ice axe to pull you up.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the afternoon session we learned how to use ascenders when climbing.
